alert.note: Alert for Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 4:59PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Pinal Counties through 545 PM MST... At 459 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Globe, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Globe, San Carlos, Cutter and Central Heights-Midland City. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 248 and 267. AZ Route 70 between mile markers 253 and 271. AZ Route 77 between mile markers 168 and 170. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County
